author: The Plain Bagel
description:
To learn for free on Brilliant, go to https://brilliant.org/theplainbagel. Brilliant’s also giving viewers 20% off an annual Premium subscription, which gives you unlimited daily access to everything on Brilliant!

00:00 - Introduction
02:09 - The Origin of 2% Inflation
04:03 - Argument for 2%
06:57 - Why Not Deflation?
09:21 - Costs and Considerations
12:30 - Why the Target Won't Change
13:48 - Sponsor

Despite economists warning on the negative impact of tariffs, the US has been reporting stronger-than-expected GDP growth, record tariff revenue, and trillions of inbound investment commitments. Let's dive into whether tariffs are actually improving the US economy.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/c/ThePlainBagel :)

DISCLAIMER:
This channel is for education purposes only and is not affiliated with any financial institution, although Richard does work as an employee for an investment manager. Richard Coffin does not provide recommendation
title: Why Central Banks WANT 2% Inflation
